alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 1:13PM MST until January 12 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM THURSDAY TO 10 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 13 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Highway 95 Slate Creek to Riggins and White Bird Grade. * WHEN...From 4 AM Thursday to 10 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region
